label: A2B4C_oP28_62_2c_2cd_c-001
title: Arcanite (K$_{2}$SO$_{4}$, $H1_{6}$) Structure
comments:
(McGinnety, 1972) gives the atomic positions using the $Pnam$ setting of space group \#62. We have switched the y- and z-axes to put the crystal in the standard $Pnma$ setting. 
 This structure is somewhat similar to \href{current_web_home_dir/A4B2C_oP28_62_2cd_2c_c-001}{Cs$_{2}$CuCl$_{4}$}, but the ICSD recognizes them as different structure types and AFLOW finds a misfit value of 0.2, sufficiently large to justify making this a new prototype.
